committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to release a reversionary interest in certain lands in Orange County Florida which were previously conveyed to Orange County, Florida.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to release the reversionary interest of the United States in specified lands on the Apopka-Vineland Road, Orange County, Florida, if the proceeds from the sale of such lands are used for park and recreation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to release a reversionary interest in certain lands in Orange County Florida which were previously conveyed to Orange County, Florida.
